/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
